sections.heading: Sections; exceptions.Nothing in sections 81-1108
sections.text: 09 and 81-1108.41 to 81-1108.43 shall apply to any actions of the Legislature in contracting for the planning, design, construction, or leasing of capital facilities for any state use.SourceLaws 1969, c. 772, ยง 7, p. 2925;Laws 1974, LB 1048, ยง 37.
